data.meta_description: Prints of A Queen in Trousers: the official dress of Her Majesty of Siam. The Queen of Siam. Our beautiful Wall Art
data.text:
Mary Evans Picture Library Photo Prints and Wall Art

The Queen of Siam

A Queen in Trousers: the official dress of Her Majesty of Siam. The Queen of Siam, who was travelling on the Continent incognito while her husband, the King of Siam visited London in June 1907. Date: 1907. Mary Evans Picture Library makes available wonderful images created for people to enjoy over the centuries. © Illustrated London News Ltd/Mary Evans

Media ID 23143040

Breeches Mar19 Official Regal Siam Siamese Thai Thailand Trousers

Framed Prints

Experience the regal elegance of history with our exquisite framed print of 'The Queen of Siam' by Mary Evans Prints Online. This captivating image showcases the unconventional fashion of the Queen, who defied traditional norms by wearing trousers during her European travels in the late 19th century. Add a touch of royal flair to your home or office décor with this beautifully presented, ready-to-hang framed print. Each print is meticulously crafted with high-quality materials, ensuring a stunning and long-lasting display. Bring a piece of history into your space and relive the intriguing story of this remarkable Queen.

Photo Prints

Experience the rich history and culture of the past with our exquisite Media Storehouse Photographic Prints. This captivating image, "The Queen of Siam" by Rights Managed from Mary Evans Prints Online, showcases a remarkable moment in time. The Queen, dressed in trousers for her incognito travels on the Continent while her husband, the King of Siam, visited London in 1907, offers a glimpse into the unique customs of the Siamese court. Each print is meticulously reproduced to preserve the original's vibrant colors and intricate details. Bring the allure of history into your home or office with this striking, museum-quality print.

Poster Prints

Introducing the captivating 'The Queen of Siam' poster print from Media Storehouse, featuring an iconic image of the enigmatic monarch. This exquisite piece, sourced from Mary Evans Prints Online, showcases the Queen in her official attire, breaking the norms of traditional royal wear with her striking outfit of trousers. Traveling incognito while her husband, the King of Siam, visited London in 1907, she remains an intriguing figure in history. Bring this captivating image into your home or office as a conversation starter and a beautiful addition to your decor. Order now and let the allure of the Queen of Siam captivate you every day.

Jigsaw Puzzles

Discover the rich history and intrigue of the past with our exquisite jigsaw puzzle from Media Storehouse, featuring the captivating image "The Queen of Siam" by Rights Managed from Mary Evans Prints Online. This stunning puzzle showcases the unique and regal attire of the Queen, who defied traditional gender norms by wearing trousers during her European travels. With intricately detailed pieces and vibrant colors, this puzzle is not only a fun and engaging activity for puzzle enthusiasts but also a beautiful addition to any room. Get lost in the story of this bold and trailblazing monarch as you piece together the history of this iconic image.
